Barrett m107
Flamethrower

item.title: Procedural Bridge System
item.description: * { box-sizing: border-box; } .img-container-x4 { float: left; width: 25%; padding: 1px; } .img-container-x4:hover img { float: left; width: 150%; padding: 1px; } .clearfix::after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } .center { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 85%; } I modeled a set of 3D bridges parts to compose a procedural bridge system, instantiated in the scenario based on a starting and an ending point.
